alternativeNames: Destrée, Elisa Caroline; Destrée, Mlle Caroline; Destrée, Caroline
examples: Calospora platanoidis f. sorbi Destrée & Rolland, Revue mycol., Toulouse 16(no. 64): 160 (1894)
notes: Mlle = Mademoiselle; Nickname: Elisa; According to the author's birth record, the full name is: Elise Caroline Destrée (vide Jan Hengstmengel)
